greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 2; a(2) = 1; for n > 2, a(n) = a(n-1)-(n-1) if this is positive and has not already appeared in the sequence, otherwise a(n) = a(n-1)+(n-1).
link: Indranil Ghosh, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences related to Recamán's sequence
program: if x>0 and x not in l: l.append(x)
